import { Component } from 'react' import Navigation from '../components/Navigation' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { Container, Button, Row, Col, Card, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' interface State { uuid: string title?: string content?: string } interface Props { data: { user: any } } class Home extends Component { constructor(props: any) { super(props) this.state = { uuid: '', title: '', content: '' } console.log(this.props.data.user) } dataValue = (e: any) => { const { name, value } = e.target this.setState({ ...this.state, [name]: value }) } btnAdd = () => { console.log(this.state) } render = (): JSX.Element => { const { username } = this.props.data.user return ( <>
Hi {username}, welcome!
This is your blogs!
Please write interesting blogs!

Title
Content
) } } const mapStateToProps = (state: any) => ({ data: state.data }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Home)
